name: indiv
description: 一个 web mvvm 库。A web mvvm library.

scripts.start: npm run clean && webpack --watch --mode=development & nodemon app.js
scripts.start:js: npm run build && webpack --watch --env=testjs --mode=development & nodemon app.js
scripts.test:ssr: rm -rf ./ssr-demo/node_modules/@indiv && npm run build && cp -r packages ./ssr-demo/node_modules/@indiv && npm run clean
scripts.test:indiv-loader: npm run clean && npm run build:indiv-loader && webpack --config webpack.test-loader.config.js --watch --mode=development & nodemon app.js
scripts.test:indiv-loader:js: npm run build && webpack --config webpack.test-loader.config.js --watch --mode=development --env=testjs & nodemon app.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/core/build packages/platform-browser/build packages/common/build packages/router/build packages/platform-server/build packages/indiv-loader/build dist .rpt2_cache
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:core && npm run build:platform-browser && npm run build:common && npm run build:router && npm run build:platform-server && npm run build:indiv-loader
scripts.build:core: rm -rf packages/core/build && rollup --config packages/core/rollup.typescript.config.js && rollup --config packages/core/rollup.config.js && rm -rf packages/core/build/bundle.js
scripts.build:platform-browser: rm -rf packages/platform-browser/build && rollup --config packages/platform-browser/rollup.typescript.config.js && rollup --config packages/platform-browser/rollup.config.js && rm -rf packages/platform-browser/build/bundle.js
scripts.build:common: rm -rf packages/common/build && rollup --config packages/common/rollup.typescript.config.js && rollup --config packages/common/rollup.config.js && rm -rf packages/common/build/bundle.js
scripts.build:router: rm -rf packages/router/build && rollup --config packages/router/rollup.typescript.config.js && rollup --config packages/router/rollup.config.js && rm -rf packages/router/build/bundle.js
scripts.build:platform-server: rm -rf packages/platform-server/build && rollup --config packages/platform-server/rollup.typescript.config.js && rollup --config packages/platform-server/rollup.config.js && rm -rf packages/platform-server/build/bundle.js
scripts.build:indiv-loader: rm -rf packages/indiv-loader/build && rollup --config packages/indiv-loader/rollup.typescript.config.js && rollup --config packages/indiv-loader/rollup.config.js && rm -rf packages/indiv-loader/build/bundle.js
scripts.merge:master: git checkout master && git pull && git checkout develop && git pull && git merge master --no-ff && git push
scripts.publish:beta: npm run build && lerna publish --dist-tag=beta --force-publish=* && npm run merge:master
scripts.publish:prod: npm run build && lerna publish  --force-publish=* && npm run merge:master

author: DimaLiLongJi
